welcome_message_body: Welcome to El Monte, a city known for its rich cultural diversity and beautiful parks. We invite you to explore our charming community and experience all the wonderful things it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.address: Av. Libertadores 1050, El Monte, Metropolitana de Santiago de Chile
